Sentence: Candide runs into a deformed beggar and discovers that it is Pangloss
Candide and Pangloss arrive in Lisbon to find it destroyed by an earthquake and under the control of the Inquisition
Pangloss is soon hanged as a heretic, and Candide is flogged for listening with approval to Pangloss's philosophy
Candide discovers Pangloss and the baron in a Turkish chain gang
